title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 100.6 - Tandem trailer combination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 100.6 - Tandem trailer combination

State Regulations
A combination of vehicles consisting of a truck tractor, first semitrailer, dolly, and second semitrailer, or a truck, dolly, and
semitrailer which exceeds the limitations of section
385
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
100.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
